const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const sectors = [ { name: 'Technology', icon: 'üíª', description: 'Software, AI, Web Development', color: 'from-blue-500 to-purple-600' }, { name: 'Agriculture', icon: 'üå±', description: 'Farming, Agritech, Rural Development', color: 'from-green-500 to-emerald-600' }, { name: 'Pharmacy', icon: 'üíä', description: 'Healthcare, Drug Research, Medical', color: 'from-red-500 to-pink-600' }, { name: 'Finance', icon: 'üí∞', description: 'Banking, Fintech, Investment', color: 'from-yellow-500 to-orange-600' }, { name: 'Education', icon: 'üìö', description: 'Teaching, EdTech, Training', color: 'from-indigo-500 to-blue-600' } ]; const featuredInternships = [ { title: 'Software Developer Intern', company: 'TechCorp India', location: 'Bangalore', duration: '3 months', stipend: '‚Çπ15,000/month', skills: ['Python', 'React', 'JavaScript'], rating: 4.8 }, { title: 'Digital Marketing Intern', company: 'StartupHub', location: 'Mumbai', duration: '2 months', stipend: '‚Çπ12,000/month', skills: ['Social Media', 'Content Writing', 'Analytics'], rating: 4.6 }, { title: 'Agricultural Research Intern', company: 'FarmTech Solutions', location: 'Pune', duration: '4 months', stipend: '‚Çπ10,000/month', skills: ['Research', 'Data Analysis', 'Agriculture'], rating: 4.7 } ]; useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentSectorIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % sectors.length); }, 3000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [sectors.length]); const nextSector = () => { setCurrentSectorIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % sectors.length);
